title: Biden embraces Trump accords, but struggles with his withdrawal from Iran nuclear deal amid growing threat
content:
1. Biden embraces Trump accords, but struggles with his withdrawal from Iran nuclear deal amid growing threat  ABC News
  2. 'Moments when nations must use force': US and allies mull military options as Iran nuclear talks fade  Yahoo News
  3. Biden special envoy warns US must 'prepare' for fully nuclear Iran  New York Post
  4. TV: Lapid, US officials discussed Iran options that weren't on the table before  The Times of Israel
  5. Bennett no longer considers Iran nuclear deal ‘historic mistake,’ but he can’t say so  Haaretz
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: バイデンはトランプ合意を受け入れたが、脅威が高まる中でのイラン核合意からの離脱に苦慮している。
